about.title: About Us
about.description1: CM360 is a consulting firm specializing in treasury management optimization, catering to small, medium, and large enterprises, as well as para-governmental organizations and NGOs.
about.description2: CM360 also provides consulting and support services to treasury management teams of financial institutions.
about.expertiseDescription: With nearly 15 years of cumulative experience in corporate treasury management, our team of experts supports you in optimizing your treasury management practices through a 360-degree analysis approach. This includes receivables, payables, treasury management systems (TMS), investment, risk management, procedures, compliance, fee structure, and best practices.
about.bullet2: Recognized expertise and experience across various industries and companies of different sizes.
about.commitmentDescription: Excellence, your objectives, and measurable results

hero.title: of Corporate Treasury
hero.subtitle: Optimize your corporate treasury management with our specialized expertise

services.sectionDescription: A complete range of services to meet all your treasury management needs.

Diagnostique de Trésorerie.title: Treasury Diagnosis
Diagnostique de Trésorerie.description: In-depth treasury diagnosis, analysis of all your operations to identify inefficiencies and improvement opportunities.
details: Account structure and surplus yield diagnosis
Receivables, payables and management system mapping
advantages: Clear vision of your treasury management
Identification of automation and process improvement opportunities
Identification of liquidity and cost optimization opportunities
Identification of financial, security, regulatory risk, etc.

Gestion de liquidité.title: Liquidity Management
Gestion de liquidité.description: Personalized solutions to optimize cash forecasting and liquidity management, guiding our clients in choosing and deploying the best tools to ensure a solid liquidity position.
advantages: Identification of fast and secure personalized solutions for payments and receivables
Restructuring of bank accounts and increased visibility of daily financial position
Better internal control of operations and teams

Optimisation des coûts.title: Cost Optimization
Optimisation des coûts.description: With our deep experience of banks and their pricing models, we help you reduce banking fees, optimize interest income, and simplify treasury management.
advantages: Review of banking agreements and more advantageous service fees
Consolidation of accounts and banking relationships
Automation and reduction of manual and repetitive operations

Appel d'offres.title: Request For Proposals
Appel d'offres.description: Specialized expertise to support companies in drafting requests for proposals for banking services and to assist treasury management teams of financial institutions in preparing responses to requests for proposals.
details: Diagnosis and mapping of current services
Identification of the company's exact needs
Mapping of structure and identification of future treasury management services
Establishment of evaluation criteria for tender responses
Support for financial institutions in preparing tender responses
advantages: Identify the best services to implement by leveraging our in-depth knowledge of banking services offered by banks

Services administratifs.title: Administrative Services
Services administratifs.description: Administrative support for small and medium-sized businesses; as well as NGOs.
advantages: Cost reduction and better resource allocation
Better tracking of accounting and financial data

Support Client.title: Customer Support
Support Client.description: Dedicated training sessions for introduction to treasury management and sharing best practices, while providing ongoing support to our clients.
details: Training of new employees regarding treasury management products and services
Best practices sharing session in treasury management
Support for selection and implementation of a treasury management system
advantages: Employees better equipped in treasury management
Efficiency gain by allocating employees to other tasks
Reduction of error risk in overall operations
